article.header: Teacher comments on partially-completed unit planners for ePortfolios

div.name: desc
div.p: Access to the teacher feedback on partially-completed unit planners for ePortfolios is now available. Teachers are encouraged to complete the questionnaire on the quality of the partially-completed unit planners...

div.name: content

p.strong: Access to the teacher feedback on partially-completed unit planners for ePortfolios is now available.

div.p: Teachers are encouraged to complete the questionnaire on the quality of the partially-completed unit planners. All comments are carefully considered during the appropriate grade award meeting and are also useful for teams preparing future unit planners.
Feedback should be submitted no later than 20 November 2016.

article.header: Teacher comments on MYP on-screen examinations

div.name: desc
div.p: Access to the teacher feedback on MYP on-screen examinations 2016 is now available. Teachers are encouraged to complete the questionnaire on the quality of the on-screen examinations...

div.name: content

p.strong: Access to the teacher feedback on MYP on-screen examinations 2016 is now available.

div.p: Teachers are encouraged to complete the questionnaire on the quality of the on-screen examinations. All comments are carefully considered during the appropriate grade award meeting and are also useful for teams preparing future unit planners.
Feedback should be submitted no later than 28 days after the examination.

article.header: Report published on the May 2016 eAssessment

div.name: desc
div.p: Find a full overview of the first MYP exam session, from candidate results and user feedback on technology to opinions from examiners and schools...

div.name: content

p.strong: Find a full overview of the first MYP exam session, from candidate results and user feedback on technology to opinions from examiners and schools.

div.p: This resource was updated on 4 November.

div.name: desc
div.p: The MYP Coordinator's notes: November 2016 are now available in English, French and Spanish...

div.name: content

p.strong: The MYP Coordinator's notes: November 2016 are now available in English, French and Spanish.

div.p: If MYP coordinators and teachers have any questions regarding either the content or technical aspects of the notes, please contact ibid@ibo.org.
This resource was updated on 3 November.
